pr_title: Cleanup metrics SDK. Rename variables, allow different aggregation for async instruments

timeline.message:
Cleanup metrics SDK. Rename variables, allow different aggregation for async

Signed-off-by: Bogdan Drutu <bogdandrutu@gmail.com>

Cleanup metrics SDK. Rename variables, allow different aggregation for async

Signed-off-by: Bogdan Drutu <bogdandrutu@gmail.com>

timeline.author: jkwatson

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/sdk/src/main/java/io/opentelemetry/sdk/metrics/DoubleSumObserverSdk.java b/sdk/src/main/java/io/opentelemetry/sdk/metrics/DoubleSumObserverSdk.java
index a3289181d..1044a0501 100644
--- a/sdk/src/main/java/io/opentelemetry/sdk/metrics/DoubleSumObserverSdk.java
+++ b/sdk/src/main/java/io/opentelemetry/sdk/metrics/DoubleSumObserverSdk.java

@@ -35,12 +35,8 @@ final class DoubleSumObserverSdk extends AbstractAsynchronousInstrument<ResultDo
         meterProviderSharedState,
         meterSharedState,
         new ActiveBatcher(
-            new ActiveBatcher(
-                getDefaultBatcher(
-                    descriptor,
-                    meterProviderSharedState,
-                    meterSharedState,
-                    Aggregations.lastValue()))));
+            getDefaultBatcher(
+                descriptor, meterProviderSharedState, meterSharedState, Aggregations.lastValue())));
   }
 
   @Override
